name: Hither Thither Shower
description:
Hither Thither Shower

My Godot Game Jam 2018 Submission

You can play it online!

https://dimonasdf.github.io/hts/Hither-Thither-Shower.html

The poing of the game is to match water temperature with the one that the boy prefers. This may look easy, but is actually somewhat hard, and on higher levels you will need some fine tuning. Just like in real shower.

Score is temporaly saved, while the game is running. As you may have guessed - the less clicks - the better is your result. Compete with everyone in comments by submitting your 10-lvl score and Endless score, if you are a hardcore player)
